# SchedulerService.Pause method

Pauses a scheduled job by its name.

```csharp
public bool Pause(string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | The name of the job to pause. |

## Return Value

True if the job was found and paused; otherwise, false.
